text: What is the official "preferred" way to install pip and virtualenv systemwide?
Is it this, which people seem to recommend most often:

code:
$ sudo apt-get install python-setuptools
$ sudo easy_install pip
$ sudo pip install virtualenv

text: Or this, which I got from http://www.pip-installer.org/en/latest/installing.html:

code:
$ curl -O https://github.com/pypa/virtualenv/raw/master/virtualenv.py
$ python virtualenv.py my_new_env
$ . my_new_env/bin/activate
(my_new_env)$ pip install ...
